WHY $NVDA WINNING DOESN‚ÄôT MEAN $AMD HAS TO FAIL -- THAT FRAMING IS DEAD WRONG

We agree with CEO Lisa Su: this is a $500B+ market.

‚Ä¢ Roughly 25% of that -- about $100B -- will go custom via $META, $AMZN, $MSFT & $GOOGL.

‚Ä¢ That leaves ~$400B & let‚Äôs be clear: NVIDIA will hold well north of 80% of the traditional accelerator market. That‚Äôs ~$375B -- & if anything, that number could rise with NVLink Fusion, Blackwell networking & their high-end training dominance.

‚Ä¢ But that still leaves ~$25B+ on the table -- a sub-10% share -- & AMD doesn‚Äôt need more than that to absolutely crush it.

You know it‚Äôs bad when the dollar can‚Äôt even rally with this‚Ä¶

Quiet day today.
Anything happening?

Market Dashboard:
northmantrader.com/2025/06/1‚Ä¶

8/8

Summary

Market moves yesterday were not about WW III. They were the expected reaction to a crude oil supply shock.

In the coming days we'll see if this narrative changes.

Until then there will be no shortage of these guys

7/8

Given this, the yield move higher makes sense, it was the expected reaction to higher energy prices leading to greater inflation fears.

6/8

This caused short-term inflation breakeven rates to spike.

Restated, the market is pricing in more near-term inflation from higher energy prices.

5/8

What did move yesterday was crude oil. It rose >7%, its biggest day rise since March 2022 (early days of the Ukraine War, 2022's start of WW III ... we seem to have at least one such WW III start a year.)

4/8

So why are we to assume yesterday's start of WW III was THE start of WW III and there should be a massive dollar rally.

Today's WSJ describes it as more like an end than a beginning.

3/8

Do you remember last year's start of WW III?

The events sound familiar ... Israel attacked Iran and Iran retaliated. 

(I'll bet you also forgot WW III also started last year.)

2/8

What is typical when events like happen is we get tables like this.

They are incredibly misleading.

They only highlight known historical events. They don't highlight events that everyone thought was the start of "WW III" but was not.

1/8

Why are we not seeing a "flight-to-quality" into the dollar? Why are bond yields rising?

The answer, I believe, is the markets are NOT viewing Israel/Iran as a safe haven event, but rather a crude oil supply shock story.

IOW, this is NOT viewed as the start of WW III.

XRP Faces a Technical Standoff

XRP's price action remains compressed within a tight range, with key moving averages flattening and acting as a magnet around the current price. This convergence reflects indecision, as price trades just below the shorter-term averages, which may act as near-term resistance.

From a bullish perspective, a decisive move back above this cluster of moving averages would signal potential for upward momentum and a retest of higher resistance levels.

From a bearish perspective, failure to reclaim these averages could leave XRP vulnerable to renewed selling pressure, reinforcing the current consolidative structure and opening the door for further downside within the range.

If you don‚Äôt love your life, it's because someone else influenced it more than you did. Don‚Äôt let that happen.  You deserve to have success and passion in your life‚Äîa big goal worth committing yourself to. You deserve to engage in a life that sparks your interest and challenges you intellectually. Your reality isn‚Äôt waiting to be discovered, it‚Äôs waiting to be created. 
Most people procrastinate. They wait for the perfect moment, the perfect plan, the perfect feeling of certainty. But here‚Äôs the truth: the perfect moment never comes. What comes is the moment you decide to stop waiting. That‚Äôs when everything begins to shift. It‚Äôs not luck. It‚Äôs not fate. It‚Äôs not waiting for motivation to strike. It‚Äôs a decision, plain and simple. A bold, non-negotiable decision that says, "No more excuses. I‚Äôm in control. Today I'm deciding to decide." 
Just as a smoker can become an ex-smoker by putting out the last cigarette or an alcoholic can put down a drink and never touch a drop again, so it is with limiting beliefs and behaviors. Change happens in an instant. You can decide to be the owner of your world‚Äîor a victim of your circumstances. You can flip the switch and activate your dreams, starting today. But first you have to decide to decide.
The choice is in your hands. What will you decide? 
Will you keep going with the status quo? Will you let your past create the same kind of future? Will you allow chance to make the decisions for you about the amount and quality of health, wealth, and happiness you experience?
You will never know what your true potential really is until you make the decision to believe in your own ability and take action. Learn from your victories, from your mistakes, and from the past. Embrace failure as a valuable part of the learning process. Then commit to an unconditional march in the directions of your dreams. You will amaze yourself! üôè
